item.title: Remote Project Lead: Thoughts and Learnings
item.description: Remotely running a project with a distributed team can be challenging. When that team is mostly from the client who you’re doing said project for, it can increase those challenges. This article shares a few niche lessons I’ve learned from being in such a position.
